attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the Eu should not be further enlarged, and that Turkey in particular should never be allowed to join the EU.
It is not geographically part of Europe.
It is islamic, whilst Europe is Christian. Recent additions to the EU have been a huge boon to those nations but what measurable benefit for the UK?

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not a name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
